section.title: Other Graphics Formats
section.para: &Yap; can convert almost any graphics file into an equivalent Windows Bitmap (BMP) file, provided that a suitable filter program is available. The BMP file will then be displayed instead of the original file.
Many filters are included in the netpbm graphics suite, which can be downloaded from the MiKTeX download page.

section.title: Specifying Filters
section.para: New filters have to be specified in the [Graphics] section of the MiKTeX configuration file (miktex.ini). A filter specification has the syntax .xxx.bmp=command, where

listitem.para: .xxx is the original file name extension
command is the command-line, which converts an XXX file into a BMP file.

section.para: The command-line must contain the following place-holders:

listitem.para: The name of the input file which has to be converted.
The name of the output (BMP) file.
